title: Gamification-Based Applied Mathematics Education for Environmental Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical statistics and data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Environmental data analysis competency enhancement program for working professionals, focusing on real-life problem-solving with digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design carbon emission calculation processes using mathematical modeling
Learners can analyze environmental policy simulation results through team-based decision-making in a gamification environment
Learners can quantitatively evaluate the effectiveness of environmental problem-solving solutions using data visualization tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
